attributes.action: Allow the sale of Swedish snus oral tobacco in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Swedish snus is oral tobacco that has helped many Swedish smokers stop smoking with massive improvements to the Swedish rates of cancer, heart disease and lung illnesses. We want the chance to quite smoking in the uk. The government could even raise a little lost revenue from it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
